FitHome


Trim the Fat from your Electricity Bills.

Help Combat Climate Change.
Take the 15% Challenge.
FitHome
  • Home
  • About
  • Tech
  • Posts
  • Contact

FitHome is a Personal Trainer for lowering your electricity consumption.

Save around $200 per year - or more - on your electricity bill.

Contribute to saving lives. If all households in the US saved at least 15%:

  • 6 lives would be saved per day.
  • There would be 30,000 fewer asthma episodes.

It’s all about the 15% Challenge!

FitHome Experience

The FitHome experience includes…

FitHome App

The app gives you insight into your electricity use. Guiding you through easy tasks you can do to save electricity.

Dashboard

Amount of electricity used.
Equivalent number of trees planted.

Dashboard

Amount of electricity being saved.

FitHome App
  • For iOS and Android.
  • Track your electricity use.
  • Find out your environmental impact.
  • See how much money you are saving.
  • Guided tasks makes using less electricity easy.
  • Beautiful and inspiring background imagery.
  • Discover currated articles on saving electricity.


FitHome Monitor

The monitor reads the amount of electricity your devices are using and sends this info to your phone.

Monitor

It looks like an upside down lollipop.

Monitor

It comes in different colors.

Monitor

An electrician hooks it
to your circuit breaker box.

Monitor

It reads how much electricity is being used
and sends the reading to the FitHome app.

Previous Next
FitHome Monitor
  • Attached to your electricity lines by an electrician.
  • Reads the amount of electricity being used.
  • Sends electricity consumption info to your phone.
